GameDBStringTable.LocalizedStrings:
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_RECRUIT_HERO_1 Visit Captain Holester with Admiral Muff $1$2$4
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_RECRUIT_HERO_1_SUB Rescue Holester's army $1$2$4
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_RECRUIT_HERO_2 Visit Major Skaurov with Admiral Muff $1$2$4
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_RECRUIT_HERO_2_SUB Conquer the Sovereign Fleet bases $1$2$4
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ENTER_REALM Enter the Central Territories $1$2$4
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_CONQUERE_REALM Conquer the Central Teritorries
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_FURRET_0 Nemek, the only agricultural ship in the fleet. I remember the rebellion. Nearly all loyalists died of hunger back then. Heh! I almost cooked my shoes. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_MUFF_0 We played the "He who can destroy a thing has true control over it" card, but we were only willing to go so far.\nNo one thought the Supreme Leader would order the bombardement of the fleet's only source of food.\nNobody understood what he was capable of risking to stay in power. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_FURRET_1 We know now. By the way, it still feels so weird calling you 'Admiral'. I can't believe you suffered taking orders from me, a mere General of Production. I'm just a walking joke in comparison. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_MUFF_1 How remarkably self-aware of you! You definitely were, when we first met. But look at you now, my friend. A true battle-hardened revolutionary general. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_RELIC_1 'Friend'? Don't be a fool, you are only a tool. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_FURRET_3 Speaking of revolution, it might be better if you meet your friends in person. After all, I will be a stranger to them. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_MUFF_3 True. I will start with Captain Holester. He got lucky and with a fresh new false identity became a colony warden. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_START_MUFF_4 Skaurov, our mole in the Supreme Leader's camp, got sniffed out. But miraculously, he ended up in the Penal Legion instead of facing a firing squad.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_PIRATE_MEETING_PPIRATE_1 Another Fossorian? You furry Judases broke the truce by torturing Kali Chapek, a captain of the Sovereign Fleet. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_PIRATE_MEETING_MOLE_1 What? We did not do anything to him! The bastard was free and completely unharmed when I last saw him. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_PIRATE_MEETING_PPIRATE_2 Lies won't save you when the Sovereign Fleet retaliates.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_AUXILIARY_JOHN7A_1 My favorite Fossorian Warlords! I am here to protect my investment, so I brought a friend to assist you. He knows how to run a Sovereign Fleet base and is as loyal as a mercenary can be.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_HOLESTER_1 Admiral Muff! There could only be one reason why you'd show up. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_MUFF_1 Yes, Captain, I need your skills once more. The Supreme Leader has a debt and I am preparing a bloody payback! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_HOLESTER_2 I lost my rank the day my ship imploded under the barrage. I am just an anonymous warden of a small mining colony now. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_MUFF_2 And how does an ordinary life suit you? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_HOLESTER_3 I should have gone down with my ship. But joining you now would be suicide. Besides, I have a problem of my own. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_HOLESTER_4 I got ambushed when I was inspecting an outpost to the south. I managed to flee but those Sovereign Fleet pirates besieged my warriors. Break the siege and we will talk again.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SKAUROV_HOLESTER_1 Greetings old friend. What brings you here?
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_DO_NOT_KNOW_HOLESTER_1 Do I know you? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_DO_NOT_KNOW_RANDOM_H_1 It would be better if you talked to Admiral Muff himself. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_DO_NOT_KNOW_HOLESTER_2 Admiral Muff is here? Bring him to me I wish to speak with him!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_HOLESTER_ARMY_1 We owe you our lives, warlord. We will join you to pay this debt.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_JOIN_HOLESTER_1 Impressive, maybe we have a chance at whatever stupid thing you are planning to do.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_RELIC_1 Days before the rebellion was crushed he faked his own death and was already searching for a way back to the loyalists. Clever, you should do the same Furret.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_1_JOINED_TEAM A commander has joined you!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_SKAUROV_1 Admiral Muff! On a warpath to overthrow the Supreme Leader, am I right? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_MUFF_1 Good guess, Major. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_SKAUROV_2 Wait, it was a joke! You cannot be serious. We got crushed last time! CRUSHED! Remember!? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_MUFF_2 Nobody remembers better than me! The Supreme Leader destroyed my ships, executed my friends, and crushed my dreams. They were also your friends and your dreams, Skaurov! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_SKAUROV_3 Sometimes I almost manage to forget. I would join you at once, admiral, if it wasn't for this one issue. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_SKAUROV_4 The high command sent me to place a radio beacon between the Sovereign Fleet bases to the south. But those pirates pinned us down the moment we arrived. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_SKAUROV_5 I cannot help you while the Sovereign Fleet pirates are threatening our back. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_MUFF_3 I know this RADIO BEACON tactic all too well. Don't worry about your back, I will deal with the pirates. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_MUFF_ALTERNATE_3 I know this RADIO BEACON tactic all too well. Don't worry about your back, I have already dealt with the pirates. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_MUFF_4 And the RADIO BEACON. Would you mind if I take it? It might prove useful later.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_JOIN_SKAUROV_1 What are my orders?
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_ALLY_2_RELIC_1 They were only pups when Skaurov stepped between his little brother and an angry tunnel worm. The scarred face reminds the Supreme Leader that he froze shaking in the puddle of his own piss while his brother fought the monster. Oh, how he hates him! Can you hate so much Furret? You should learn that!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_NORTH_GATE_FURRET_1 The old rebels have assembled! But beware! We will be attacked the moment we try to enter the central territories. What is the plan? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_NORTH_GATE_MUFF_1 You know what? I think I will borrow a page from your book, Furret. Take everyone and charge! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_NORTH_GATE_FURRET_2 YEAH! That's the Fossorian way!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_1_SNIF1 Splendid, I managed to arrive just in time to warn the local garrison about you! Sergant Moltair! Bring me his head! Now, I must go and inform the Supreme Leader! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_1_MOLTAIR1 Err, commissar? Wouldn't you and your troops rather stay ... to supervise our victory? The rebel army is bigger than we anticipated. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_1_SNIF2 DO AS I COMMAND! A firing squad is the only alternative I offer. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_1_MOLTAIR2 As you command, commissar! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_1_ANY What a coward!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_2_SNIF2 INCOMPETENT IMBECILES! I left for only a moment and everything turned to ash! But I am cut from a different mold. You will see. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_2_SNIF1 You may have enough warriors to usurp a province, but against the might of the Supreme Leader's army, you have no chance! Stay, run, or invade, it matters not. You are on borrowed time!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_2_MUFF_1 Tell him that Admiral Muff sends his regards! He will know. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_2_FURRET_1 I promised that I would repay you for my time in the Penal Legion. Consider this the first check! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_2_OTHER HERO_1 This is for our executed brothers and for Nemek! Down with the tyranny of the Supreme Leader! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_SNIF_ENCOUNTER_2_AUX_HERO_1 I don't think so. My employers are quite the legendary raiders. And I believe those guys will kick your boss's ass.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_WARNING_FOSSORIAN_TERRITORY This valley leads to the center of Fossorian territory. Only a fool would advance without the armies of other warlords on our side!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_FURRET_MEETS_BENI Another day, another filthy halfbreed!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_MOLES_LVL3_END_TEXT The path to the heart of Fossorian territory is clear. Sure, the rebels lack the numbers, but assembling the Supreme Leader's armies, most of which are occupied by skirmishes in the border regions, will take a long time.\nOne quick, precise strike is all it takes. But if our 'heroes' miss, there will be no second chance. Luckily, they have a few aces up their sleeves.\nAnd if everything goes south? There's the RADIO BEACON acquired by Admiral Muff. By now you already know what it really is and as one wise Fossorian once said, "A nuclear weapon is always the best starting point for every successful negotiation!".
